title: Note Taker
description: A CRUD application used to write, save, and delete user notes.

title: Whiskey Journal
description: A CRUD application allowing users to track whiskeys they've tasted and save tasting notes to a SQL database

title: Burger App
description: A dynamic CRUD application that takes user input and manipulates it within the viewport based on click events.

title: React Weather App
description: A real time weather dashboard sourcing information from the OpenWeather API based on user input, bootstrapped with create-react-app
